name: Mohammad Arsath
bio: A passionate Full Stack Developer who loves building modern, responsive web applications. I enjoy solving problems, learning new tools, and delivering user-friendly experiences.
about: Hi, I'm Mohammad Arsath. I'm currently staying in Erode, Tamil Nadu. I graduated with a B.E. in Computer Science under Anna University, Chennai in 2023.

Currently, I’m working remotely as a Software Engineer, contributing to hospital management software applications using Java, JSP, SQL, and reporting tools. I also have hands-on experience in full-stack development using the MERN stack.

I’m passionate about building user-friendly web applications and always eager to learn and take on new challenges. I have a strong foundation in full-stack web technologies. I enjoy solving problems and building responsive web applications.

My interests and free time activities include frontend design, backend architecture, exploring new tools to enhance user experiences, attending tech bootcamps & webinars, and self-paced learning. I thrive in collaborative and creative environments, working effectively with teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
